Reference

All functions

GREAT

GREAT package

apply_best_normalisation()

Apply normalisation (after applying stretch)

apply_best_shift()

Register all expression over time using optimal shift found

apply_shift_to_registered_genes_only()

Apply shift for all registered genes

apply_stretch()

Apply stretch factor

calc_AIC()

Calculate Akaike's ‘An Information Criterion’

calc_BIC()

Calculate Bayesian Information Criterion

calc_extreme_shifts()

Calculate extreme shifts

calc_num_overlapping_points()

Calculate the number of overlapping points

calc_sample_distance()

Calculate sample distance wrapper

calc_score()

Calculate mean score of observed expression data and expected value

calculate_all_best_shifts()

Calculate scores for all candidate shifts for all genes in data frame.

calculate_all_model_comparison_stats()

Wrapper of applying best shifts and compare the registered and unregistered models

calculate_between_sample_distance()

Calculate distance between sample data before and after registration

calculate_pairwise_sample_distance_main()

Calculate pairwise sample distance

compare_registered_to_unregistered_model()

Comparing registered to unregistered model

get_best_result()

Get the best result

get_best_shift()

Calculate the score for all shifts

get_best_stretch_and_shift()

Calculate best shifts and stretches for each gene, also calculate AIC/BIC under registration or non-registration

get_compared_timepoints()

Flag data to transform time points which overlap to reference data timecourse

get_extreme_shifts_for_all()

Calculate extreme shifts after the stretch transformation

get_mean_and_all_exp_data()

Simplify reference data and data to transform into one dataframe

impute_transformed_exp_values()

Setting transformed expression data and reference data to be the same in a set of common time points

interpolate_data_ref_comparison_expression()

Calculate prediction of reference data expression value

make_heatmap()

Visualise distances between samples from different time points to investigate the similarity of progression of gene expression states between species before or after registration

max_is_compared_to_data_to_transform()

Get the largest time point of reference data

min_is_compared_to_data_to_transform()

Get the smallest time point of reference data

plot_registered_gene_of_interest()

Plot gene of interest after registration

scale_all_rep_data()

Scaling all un-averaged data

scale_and_register_data()

Registering data

shorten_groups()

Shorten groups
